title: H.A.L.F.: The Deep Beneath: Human-Alien Life Form
features: He’s a living weapon. She’s a teenage fugitive. Together they’ll uncover an alien conspiracy—or die trying.

Erika Holt keeps her entanglements to a minimum and her eyes on the horizon. She’s counting the days until she graduates, when she’ll motor out of her dusty, dying border town to start a new life by the sea.
But fate has other plans for Erika. When a quiet night in the desert turns deadly, Erika and her friends evade death with the help of a very odd stranger.

Created to be a weapon, HALF Nine can kill using only his mind. Part alien, part human, he’s never known kindness… until his escape from a top-secret facility brings him face to face with a courageous woman, unlike anyone he has ever known.
As Erika and Nine work to secure their freedom, they uncover a conspiracy as vast as the galaxy. Will they survive the secrets of the deep beneath?
A page-turning read filled with mystery and action, HALF: The Deep Beneath is a riveting novel about the power of friendship and the courage of the human heart.
Accolades for H.A.L.F.: The Deep Beneath:
Finalist in the 2015 Kindle Book Review Awards
Finalist in the 2015 Kindle Book Review Awards
Silver Medal 2015, Wishing Shelf Book Awards
Silver Medal 2015, Wishing Shelf Book Awards

Chosen by Library Journal for its Curated eBook Collection

Silver Award 2015, Beach Book Festival Awards

Praise for
HALF: The Deep Beneath
“A fast-paced sci-fi adventure. Silver Medalist in the Wishing Shelf Awards and highly recommended.” ~Wishing Shelf Reviews

“The action is great, and the scene with the alien spaceship was crazy good. I found the ending to be quite surprising. It made me want to read the next one to see what happens both above ground and below. I recommend this to all fans of sci-fi adventures.” ~
CJ Anaya
, Best Selling Author of
The Healer Series
“Once I began, I couldn't put it down. It’s well-written, fast-paced, and the characters are believable. I highly recommend this book and anxiously await book 2!" ~
M. Williams
“Extremely exciting and fast-paced story that sucked me into its sci-fi vortex and wouldn't let me go. HALF 9 is probably my favorite alien hybrid of all time. Can’t wait for the next book!” ~
Ms. I Read to Escape
description: Natalie Wright is the author of The Akasha Chronicles series and H.A.L.F., a young adult science fiction series. She lives in Arizona with her husband, daughter and two cats. When not writing, reading or gaming, Natalie travels the southwest meeting fellow geeks and book fans at comic cons and book festivals throughout the western U.S.
"A fast-paced sci-fi adventure. Silver Medalist in the Wishing Shelf Awards and highly recommended." Wishing Shelf Reviews
